p:
The disease has a high attack rate, and a large percentage of those infected are symptomatic compared with those infected with other arboviruses. Attack rates reach 35-75% of a population in a single epidemic
2
,
6 . On RÃ©union Island, the surveillance system during the epidemic confirmed 16,050 laboratory cases and estimated a total of 244,000 cases, which corresponded to an attack rate of 35%
7 . Moreover, approximately 40-95% of CHIKV-infected individuals may present disease symptoms
2
,
8 .
